thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Sunday, 28 Jan 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Shandong Tongda Island New Materials sees FY 2017 net profit down 15 pct to 35 pct

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Shandong Tongda Island New Materials sees FY 2017 net profit down 15 pct to 35 pct

organizations.name: shandong tongda island new materials co ltd

text:
Jan 29(Reuters) - Shandong Tongda Island New Materials Co Ltd
* Sees FY 2017 net profit to decrease by 15 percent to 35 percent, or to be 21.5 million yuan to 28.2 million yuan
* Says FY 2016 net profit was 33.1 million yuan
* Says exchange losses is the main reason for the forecast
Source text in Chinese: goo.gl/APCcfw
Further company coverage: (Beijing Headline News)
